snippet: Max Scherzer became baseball’s first 17-game winner as the Detroit Tigers posted their 12th straight victory, routing the host Cleveland Indians, 10-3.
abstract: Detroit Tigers post their 12th straight victory, routing Cleveland Indians, 10-3; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Max Scherzer became baseball’s first 17-game winner as the Detroit Tigers posted their 12th straight victory, routing the host Cleveland Indians, 10-3.
